messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: CHN conference
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Connie.  I get days mixed up all the time.  I even had to change our hotel reservatation because I mixed the days up.  Hope to see you there. Kay
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Connie. I get days mixed up all the time. I even had to change our hotel reservatation because I mixed the days up. Hope to see you there.
Kay

messages.subject: Re: CHN conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/19/04 5:29:32 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... ***Do I have my wires crossed??  I thought the conference was on Fri/Sat. These are my
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/19/04 5:29:32 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Hi Connie,
> My family and I are coming to the conference but will only be there Sat. and
> Sun. What day are you speaking?
> Kay
>

***Do I have my wires crossed?? I thought the conference was on Fri/Sat.

These are my sessions. I'm concerned that they are late in the day, when
everyone may be "conferenced out". Thought I'd bring some snacks and "advertise"
them in advance! :-) Hope to see you there, Kay.

Connie

Friday: Magnolia, session 6  4:30-5:30
  What I Wish I'd Have Known Back Then
  Connie Colten
  An unschooler talks about her 23 years of homeschool experience, wanting
to 
  share her experience so you can benefit from what she's learned.


  Saturday: University session 12  4:00-5:00
  The Wonder and the Fun
  Connie Colten
  The author of Homeschooling Reflections reflects on her many years of
raising
  her five unschooled children.  Did they get into college?  And are they
  socialized?



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
